Title: Wild
Writer: Nagraj Manjule (story and screenplay), Nagraj Manjule (dialogue), Bharat Manjule (dialogue)
Actors: Rinku Rajguru, Akash Thosar, Arbaz Shaikh, Tanaji Galgunde
Plot: In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.
